item.title: Ruth Franklin's Instructional Video
item.description: The Artistic Touch School of Embroidery Video gives all of the information needed to learn to operate a chain stitch embroidery machine. The video is a recording of Ruth Franklin herself and covers everything that was taught to her students in person. The full 2hr instructional video can be found in its original quality below. Its accompanying transcript is available for download as well.
